post.desc:
Going by the *Perfect Memento* for beast yо̄kai, more tails means more magic power, and bigger tails means more clever. I suppose it would means this here illustrates the leveling path Chen might choose to specialize – a STR build or an INT build?

Hmm... if we use this indication on Mamizō, this would mean our tanuki here is really clever, but actually not so powerful?
